Quality Linux VPS Servers At The Best price

Even though these are our lowest cost virtual private servers, the Linux VPS range offers you a very high level of performance and security compared to competitor offers at a similar price level. Ideal for getting started in virtualization - easy, fast and great value!

Free DDoS Protection on Linux VPS Servers: Free DDoS Protection

Don't know which Linux VPS Server to choose? Consult our guide on choosing the right VPS

We Accept Bitcoin, Okypay, Payza (Alertpay), Moneybookers (Skrill), Perfect Money and Egopay as payment methods. Users from all countries are accepted. If you have any questions please feel free to submit a sales ticket with our sales department.


FEATURES:
--- Management: Semi-management
--- Backup: Once a week
--- Instant Reboots within the VPS control Panel.
--- Instant OS reloads within the VPS control panel.
--- Instant Shutdown/power on your VPS server within the control panel.
--- 100Mbps & 1Gbps internet connections.
--- Raid-10 protected hard drives. This means Zero down time in case of hardware failures.
--- Built-in server console within the VPS control panel.
--- TUN/TAP options within the VPS control panel.
--- Change your host name instantly via VPS control panel.

Fast Windows VPS Servers At The Best price

Built on our own experience in cloud computing, Windows VPS offers you a gateway to the best of virtualization. You get a high-tech VMware® virtualization infrastructure , advanced security services (backup, snapshots), guaranteed by 99.99% SLA! At no extra cost, you also get a licence enabling you to use Windows on your server. For web agencies or if you want make managing your server easier, you can also host up to 10 sites free with the included Plesk licence (Plesk or cPanel licences for unlimited websites are also available). !
